programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - New Ground
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 Worf learns some painful lessons about parenting when his son Alexander arrives to join his father on the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Hero Worship
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 A young boy who is the sole survivor of a devastated ship becomes obsessed with simulating Data.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Violations
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 Troi, Riker and Dr. Crusher fall into unexplained comas while the Enterprise plays host to an alien race.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Masterpiece Society
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 Picard's efforts to save a genetically engineered society from a natural disaster threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Conundrum
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 14 While suffering an unexplained case of amnesia, the crew finds themselves fighting a war they do not remember or understand.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Power Play
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 15 Inhabited by alien spirits, Data and Troi overthrow the Bridge of the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Ethics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 16 Loyalty and ethics clash when a paralyzed Worf asks to help him commit suicide.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Outcast
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 17 A rescue mission leads to a dangerous romance between Riker and a rebellious member of an androgynous race.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Cause and Effect
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 18 The Enterprise is trapped in a time warp that forces the crew to endlessly repeat the same experiences.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The First Duty
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 19 Caught between loyalty to his friends and the need to tell the truth, Wesley becomes involved in a cover-up when his Starfleet Academy squadron suffers a deadly collision.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Cost of Living
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 Preparing for her wedding aboard the Enterprise, Troi's free-thinking mother causes trouble between Worf and his son.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Perfect Mate
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 21 A beautiful woman, chosen by her people to serve as a peace offering to end a centuries-long war, falls in love with Picard.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Imaginary Friend
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 22 A little girl's imaginary friend becomes a frightening reality for the crew when she threatens to destroy the Enterprise.

programme.title: Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars - Farscape: The Peacekeeper Wars: Part 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Determined not to let his child be born into a world at war, John Crichton puts himself at the center of the conflict.

programme.title: Meteor - Meteor
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Sean Connery, Natalie Wood, Karl Malden, Brian Keith, Martin Landau, Trevor Howard and Henry Fonda star in this meteoric thriller. In six days, a massive meteor will crash to earth and the only chance to destroy it is to work with the Soviets.

programme.title: Supernova - Supernova
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 "Supernova" chronicles the search and rescue patrol of a deep space medical ship and its six-member crew.

programme.title: Final Days of Planet Earth - Final Days of Planet Earth: Episode 1
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When the tragic team of astronauts enlisted to excavate the moon returns to earth, it brings with it an alien-insect race that must harvest human bodies for survival. As their underground colony thrives, so does the fear that mankind’s end has arrived.

programme.title: Final Days of Planet Earth - Final Days of Planet Earth: Episode 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 When the tragic team of astronauts enlisted to excavate the moon returns to earth, it brings with it an alien-insect race that must harvest human bodies for survival. As their underground colony thrives, so does the fear that mankind’s end has arrived.

programme.title: Iron Sky - Iron Sky
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The Nazis set up a secret base on the dark side of the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.

programme.title: Harbinger Down - Harbinger Down
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 While studying the effects of global warming on a pod of whales, graduate students on the ship Harbinger uncover a frozen Soviet space shuttle. After 30 years of thawing from the ice, a once trapped monstrous organism is unleashed on the students.

programme.title: Most Daring - Riots & Rumbles
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two restaurant workers use their wrestling moves on an armed robber; a young surfer is beaten after wandering onto a locals-only beach; a family feud erupts at a wedding reception.

programme.title: Most Daring - Fight For Survival
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A thrillseeker takes a tumble from his snowmobile in British Columbia, Canada; a man loses control of his superbike; two lions attack their keeper.

programme.title: Most Daring - Craziest Crimes Caught on Tape
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 Thugs attacking a wheelchair-bound man are shocked when he fights back; food thief; bank surveillance cameras record a smash-and-grab heist.

programme.title: Most Daring - Horror on the Highway 3
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 A car crashes into a fuel pump, turning a gas station into a deathtrap; bystanders race to save a family trapped in a burning car in the middle of highway traffic; two cars crash through a store's front doors.

programme.title: Court Cam - Top 10 Moments
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 A one-hour special featuring the best moments from season one of A&E's Court Cam.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 203
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: An emotional trial leads to an all-out brawl outside a Massachusetts courthouse; a defendant assaults his own attorney; the mother of a murder victim forgives her son's killer; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam - 207
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: Fists fly when a quiet Michigan courtroom erupts into an all-out melee; a pro-pot defendant lights up right in front of a judge.

programme.title: Most Daring - Riots & Rumbles
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two restaurant workers use their wrestling moves on an armed robber; a young surfer is beaten after wandering onto a locals-only beach; a family feud erupts at a wedding reception.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Blackout
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Dallas homicide detective Robert Arredondo was called to his first case as lead detective on in November of 2007.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 On a Sunday night in June 2007, Christian Marton and his girlfriend Monica Stafford drove two hours from Axtell, Texas to Dallas where Christian had arranged to buy a car. By the end of the evening, Christian was dead--shot in a robbery attempt.

programme.title: After the First 48 - The Boogey Man
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 On March 26th, 2006, homicide detectives were called to the site of a burning car. Inside were the charred remains of 22-year-old Xenia Wilson, the mother of a four-year-old daughter.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Lester Street One Hour Version
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 6 In September of 2010, Jessie Dotson went on trial for one of the worst mass murders in Memphis history. He wasn't accused of killing strangers--he was brother, friend, and uncle to the six people he'd allegedly murdered.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Final Investment
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 When a robbery goes bad in south Memphis, one man is dead and very little physical evidence is left at the scene.

programme.title: After the First 48 - After The First 48: Drama at The Classic/50G Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 On October 26, 2008, Birmingham homicide detectives were helping with crowd control at the Magic City Classic--a renowned football game between two of the oldest black colleges in Alabama.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Blackout
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Dallas homicide detective Robert Arredondo was called to his first case as lead detective on in November of 2007.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Nightclub Nightmare
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 202 The story of Laura Garza’s murder, how her killer was identified and how, two years after her disappearance, investigators got the break they needed after her body was discovered.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Body in the Field
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 203 The tragic story of Mary Ann Perez, and how an extensive cold case investigation utilizing DNA advancements, was finally able to solve her random and horrific murder.

programme.title: The First 48 - Roadside Burning / Blood Ties (#19) (2005)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 In Dallas, a motorist passing along a highway discovers a man's body with a knife wound to the chest and his genitals burnt up.

programme.title: The First 48 - Frenzy / Hard Truth
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 3 In Miami, Sgt. Louis Melancon and Det. Carlos Castellanos investigate the murder of two men savagely gunned down in the middle of a residential street. Detectives learn that a roommate of the two victims is missing.

programme.title: The First 48 - Breaking the Silence / Letters of Intent
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 7 In Cincinnati, Detectives Keith Witherell and Bill Hilbert attempt to crack the code of silence surrounding the death of a 28-year-old man gunned down on Main Street.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Cold Justice
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 In 1983, several young mothers are raped and murdered on the west side of Louisville Kentucky. A conviction on two of the murders leaves a third family with no justice. Until 31 years later.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Kiss of Death
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 A man is brutally gunned down on a neighborhood street in Rochester, New York. Investigators believe his estranged wife, a prostitute, is lying to them about his murder.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Deadly Dance
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 In Las Vegas, a professional dancer disappears without a trace. Her boyfriend provides no leads. Finally, after weeks of dead ends, a tip blows the case wide open. At trial, the prosecution has an eyewitness and plenty of evidence on their side.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Date Night
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 Just four days before Christmas 2013, a single mother of five is shot twice, dumped in a East Cleveland street, and ran over by the killer.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Snapshot Killer
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 204 The story of the brutal murder of a young woman, how despite an extensive investigation the case went cold and how revolutionary forensic technology unlocked the case and revealed a twist in the tale.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Schenectady Strangler
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 205 The Schenectady Strangler is the story of the tragic murder of Brett Wentworth, how police tracked his killer down and how advanced forensic technology was the key to solving the case.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Small Town Slayer
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 206 The tragic story of the murder of Brenda Dupont and how after 28 years, the officers involved were determined to bring the perpetrator to justice using advanced forensic techniques.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Nightmare Neighbors
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 207 The story of the senseless and cruel murder of Denise O’Neill. The program unveils the comprehensive forensics and shrewd detective work involved in bringing her killers to justice.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.
